payload.description: Dependency Injection framework to configure a PSR-11 Container with Attributes!

issue.title: Deprecate logging in Bootstrap and Static Analysis steps
issue.body: The current implementation logs extensive, detailed information about the bootstrapping and static analysis steps. In practice, this is very noisy in logs and presents challenges when running integration style tests as logs are designed out-of-the-box to stream to `stdout`. Instead of logging this information during these steps we should instead use a dependency-free event system that provides the same-or-better level of detail as the existing logging system. This ticket is strictly to deprecate the places where requiring a logger during the bootstrapping and static analysis steps have been exposed in public facing APIs and configurations.

issue.title: Implement detailed event system to replace use of psr/log
Remove psr/log as a Composer dependency
